audioText: Son talent artistique tombera horriblement si elle ne pratique pas régulièrement son instrument de musique.
question: What will happen to her artistic talent?
options: It will fall horribly if she doesn't practice her musical instrument regularly
It will improve dramatically with dedicated daily practice sessions
It will remain stable regardless of her practice frequency
It will develop in unexpected directions with creative exploration
explanation: The correct answer is 'It will fall horribly if she doesn't practice her musical instrument regularly'. The text states 'Son talent artistique tombera horriblement si elle ne pratique pas régulièrement son instrument de musique' - Her artistic talent will fall horribly if she doesn't practice her musical instrument regularly. 'Tombera' is the future form of 'tomber' (to fall), and 'horriblement' means 'horribly'.
source: Strategic vocabulary development - artistic talent context
